content.rendered:
Directed by Lakshman.

Written by Madhankarky. Rokesh. Thamarai.

Cast Jayam Ravi(IPS Vikram). Arvind Swami(Adithya Maravarman / Bogan). Hansika Motwani(Mahalakshmi). Nassar(Professor Chezhiyan). Ponvannan(Police Commissioner R. Rajkumar). Aadukalam Naren(Arumugam (as Naren)). Nagendra Prasad(Inspector Prasad). Varun Kamal(Inspector Sathya (as Varun)). Akshara Gowda(Inspector Akshara) .Mozammel Hoshen Chowdhury. Jaya Murali(Mahalakshmi’s Mother). Sindhu Shyam(Vikram’s Sister).Raju Sundaram. U.R.Jameel(Childhood Adithya Maravarman / Bogan)

Language Tamil.

Producers Sahni Bob. Prabhu Deva. Dr.K. Ganesh. K. Ashwin Kumar.

Production Prabhudheva Studios. Sri Green Productions.
